name: Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal Bread
author: Monique David
summary: Tender and chewy, with a light touch of cinnamon, this quick bread is perfect for a winter morning.
ingredients: 2 packets instant apple cinnamon oatmeal (single serving size)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease and flour a 9x5 inch loaf pan
In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy
Mix in applesauce, cinnamon and one packet oatmeal
Stir in the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition
Mix in the baking soda and flour
Pour batter into prepared pan and sprinkle with remaining packet of oatmeal
Bake in preheated oven for 60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean
